Steve Ballmer said the partnership with Nokia, which will see the world's largest mobile phone manufacturer shifting to Windows Phone as its operating system, will help accelerate its adoption. Nokia's involvment with Windows Phone will drive volume, innovation of new products, and will accelerate adoption of the Windows Phone platform, said the Microsoft chief. said:`` I love The Hoff.'' The first of the judges to arrive was motormouth comic Michael McIntyre , 34, who knew exactly what he was after from the Scottish acts. He said: We've had Subo then we had Janey Cutler.`` This year I'm looking for an even older woman.`` They are getting older and older.`` I'm hoping for a 98-year-old woman to just turn up and blow the roof off the Armadillo. Michael McIntyre and The Hoff took over judges' duties from Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell , who will return for the live TV shows. Also gee-ing up the crowd were pint-sized Geordie presenters Ant and Dec.
